message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of recovering full 3D mesh human poses from monocular videos, which is a topic that falls under computer vision (cs.CV) and graphics (cs.GR). The paper also proposes a deep learning model for this task, which involves recurrent neural networks (cs.MM) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper discusses the use of synthetic data for training the model, which is a common theme in artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
